name: tabtogether
description: Send tabs to multiple devices simultaneously.
author: Ron Katzir

scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs background.js -o dist/background.js && uglifyjs utils.js -o dist/utils.js && uglifyjs popup.js -o dist/popup.js && uglifyjs options.js -o dist/options.js && uglifyjs shared-ui.js -o dist/shared-ui.js && uglifyjs theme.js -o dist/theme.js && uglifyjs constants.js -o dist/constants.js
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o dist/styles.css styles.css && cleancss -o dist/popup.css popup.css && cleancss -o dist/shared-ui.css shared-ui.css
scripts.minify:html: html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments -o dist/popup.html popup.html && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments -o dist/options.html options.html
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:html
scripts.prepare-dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp manifest.json LICENSE SECURITY.md README.md dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.build:prod: npm run prepare-dist && npm run minify
scripts.build: npm run build:prod && web-ext build --source-dir dist --artifacts-dir web-ext-artifacts --overwrite-dest
scripts.package: echo 'Use GitHub Actions workflow for packaging.'
